queries.query:
from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "controller")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "x" or r["_field"] == "y")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gyro")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "x" or r["_field"] == "y" or r["_field"] == "z")
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> yield(name: "points")

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
import "math"

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "controller")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "x" or r["_field"] == "y")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: math.mMax(x:r.x, y:r.y) }))  
  |> yield(name: "derivative")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gyro")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "x" or r["_field"] == "y" or r["_field"] == "z")
  |> yield(name: "gyro")

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"
import "math"
crazynessThreshold = 250

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "controller")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "x" or r["_field"] == "y")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: math.mMax(x:r.x, y:r.y) }))  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > crazynessThreshold)
  |> yield(name: "too_crazy_moves")

import "math"
maxVibration = 4000

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gyro")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "x" or r["_field"] == "y" or r["_field"] == "z")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: math.abs(x: r._value)}))  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > maxVibration)  
  |> yield(name: "mean")
